title: Allugae: Your next phone is here!
subtitle: This project was developed as a final assignment for university. The idea behind AllugaÃª was to create a company that aims to simplify the process of renting smartphones, allowing people to upgrade their phones more frequently while always having newer models. All of this without paying high prices for a phone over several years.
myrole: As a Product Designer, I was responsible for conducting a competitor benchmark, identifying points where the company could differentiate itself, and defining a business model that would be attractive and competitive with other companies.
tools: Forms, Notion, Google Analytics, Figma, Maze.
problemCaption: You can navigate through the prototypes used in usability tests by clicking here.

paragraph.descText: Interviews conducted via Forms, aiming to map the value perception of our users regarding mobile device rentals.

paragraph-2.descText: In the competitor analysis, data was collected from websites, complaint platforms, social media, and clients of some of the services.

paragraph-3.descText: A style guide was defined to standardize design deliverables and facilitate handoff.

paragraph-4.descText: Wireframes created at mid-fidelity, defining the information hierarchy.

paragraph-5.descText: The final layout was developed based on mid-fidelity wireframes, with a focus on defining information hierarchy.
